name: BioRender
headline: 'Figma/Canva for scientistsâ
description:
You can think of BioRender as the âFigma/Canva for scientistsâ, with a suite of web-based graphics communication products to empower scientists to create beautiful scientific visuals and presentations with ease.

BioRender is the worldâs first tool to help scientists create and share beautiful, professional scientific figures. Our mission is to accelerate the worldâs ability to learn, discover and communicate science. We are passionate about democratizing science communication in order to accelerate scientific discovery and understanding.

founders.name: Shiz Aoki, Founder/CEO
founders.description:
Co-founder, CEO at BioRender
Former Lead Science Illustrator at National Geographic Magazine
Grad studies at Johns Hopkins University School of Medicine
Passionate about accelerating science and empowering the world to communicate science faster through visuals

# Create Professional Science Figures in Minutes
Browse thousands of pre-made icons and templates from more than 30 fields of life sciences.
[SIGN UP FREE](https://www.biorender.com/<https:/app.biorender.com/signup>)
Available online for any computer. No download required.
[Immunology](https://www.biorender.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Microbiology](https://www.biorender.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Neuroscience](https://www.biorender.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[And 30+ fields!](https://www.biorender.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/621e6f1effebfe03881da9bd/62be04a6955fd90391a5bfae_up.svg)

scientists have created figures with BioRender

citations with BioRender figures

Used by thousands of trusted institutions:
![Amircus Therapeutics Logo
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/621e6f1effebfe03881da9bd/659d8c3de2abcd33c9f55196_6526956873f87473b7956c58_Amicus_logo-p-500%201.svg)![Beam Therapeutics Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/621e6f1effebfe03881da9bd/659d8c44a13a4b70b2fe527e_65269540e3dd9aa3d8a40884_Beam_logo-p-500%201.svg)![Roche logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/621e6f1effebfe03881da9bd/6282b1f128b0161c9c5f5839_roche.webp)![Genentech logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/621e6f1effebfe03881da9bd/6282b1f256cd87d6bedab519_genentech.webp)![Abbvie logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/621e6f1effebfe03881da9bd/6282b1f2f874c723d0d9d357_abbvie.webp)![National Institutes of Health](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/621e6f1effebfe03881da9bd/6282b1f10dbd5026705d3326_nih.png)
![screenshot of BioRender’s scientific icons](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/621e6f1effebfe03881da9bd/64060178e53791816eb3e9c7_features-library.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/621e6f1effebfe03881da9bd/62950afa9c5ee7b288ca4fb8_thousands-of-biological-icons.png)
## THOUSANDS OF ICONS
Browse over 50,000 icons and templates from over 30 fields of life science, curated and vetted by industry professionals.
![decorative drag and drop icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/621e6f1effebfe03881da9bd/6406019100a5b7a79d791fa6_drag-and-drop-icon.webp)
## DRAG AND DROP
Simple drag-and-drop functionality enables you to create scientific figures up to 50 times faster.
![screenshot of BioRender’s drag and drop feature](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/621e6f1effebfe03881da9bd/64060182ac631c4b4169797a_home-page-drag-and-drop.webp)
![graphic showing the steps of creating a custom icon with BioRender’s software](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/621e6f1effebfe03881da9bd/640601aaaaec6d7b3cfd7e9c_home-page-request.webp)
![Decorative icon of edit function](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/621e6f1effebfe03881da9bd/6406019b8966bc354b3a50a0_edit-icon.webp)
## **CUSTOM ICONS**
Find icons you need for even the most specialized fields of life science, or we’ll create it in as little as 48 hours ([conditions apply](https://www.biorender.com/<https:/help.biorender.com/hc/en-gb/articles/17605389580573-What-are-custom-icon-requests-Premium-Only>)).
![Scroll left through slides](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/621e6f1effebfe03881da9bd/62c5dca884af254cd33d9fb0_slide-arrow-left.svg)
![Scroll right through slides](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/621e6f1effebfe03881da9bd/62c5dca3959485635289ed32_slide-arrow-right.svg)
Discover beautiful, professional scientific templates
With 100s of customizable templates from expert science designers, making a figure has never been easier
[![Scientific template made using Biorender](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/621e95f9ac30687a56e4297e/640602c0225f56099012e6c0_genome.webp)](https://www.biorender.com/<https:/app.biorender.com/biorender-templates/t-5f05197aa7327600aac0ef31-whole-genome-sequencing>)

[BROWSE TEMPLATES](https://www.biorender.com/<https:/app.biorender.com/biorender-templates>)
![HSV infection scientific figure](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/621e6f1effebfe03881da9bd/640601bbaf3c3f55a97ede19_hsv.webp)
Figure: During HSV infection, memory CD4-T-cells respond to antigens in neural tissue by secreting IFN-γ and loosening tight junctions between endothelial cells, allowing antibodies to cross the blood-brain-barrier.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/621e6f1effebfe03881da9bd/627d82dd3c5b8b9946b35a67_quote-left.svg)
![Testimonial from Akiko Iwasaki, PhD. Professor, Dept. of Immunobiology, Yale School of Medicine](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/621e6f1effebfe03881da9bd/640601c2713277492737bf6f_akiko.webp)
NO MORE CIRCLES AND SQUARES IN POWERPOINT!
Akiko Iwasaki, PhD
Professor, Dept. of Immunobiology, Yale School of Medicine, HHMI
BioRender has revolutionized the way we draw and communicate our science. Because of the large number of pre-drawn icons and color schemes to choose from, I can create beautiful images that accurately depict our scientific findings in no time. I don't know what I would do without BioRender. My 'circles and square figure' days in PowerPoint are over!
[MORE TESTIMONIALS](https://www.biorender.com/</testimonials>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/621e6f1effebfe03881da9bd/627d82dd3c5b8b9946b35a67_quote-left.svg)
Recently published in:
![Scientific Reports](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/621e6f1effebfe03881da9bd/62bccf3dc3f4e4f1d266d6d4_published-in-scientific-reports.png)![CELLPRESS](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/621e6f1effebfe03881da9bd/62bccf9bea98bc9a22813e1b_published-in-cellpress.png)![Published in the Journal of Physiology](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/621e6f1effebfe03881da9bd/62bccf9dbf71cf5ab9ba1cc1_published-in-journal-of-physiology.png)![Published in nature](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/621e6f1effebfe03881da9bd/62bccf9f57bc792717b29ef9_published-in-nature.png)![Published in annual reviews](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/621e6f1effebfe03881da9bd/62bccfa1164f6e7f753b27d1_published-in-annual-reviews.png)

Figure: During HSV infection, memory CD4-T-cells respond to antigens in neural tissue by secreting IFN-γ and loosening tight junctions between endothelial cells, allowing antibodies to cross the blood-brain-barrier.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/621e6f1effebfe03881da9bd/627d82dd3c5b8b9946b35a67_quote-left.svg)
![Testimonial from Akiko Iwasaki, PhD. Professor, Dept. of Immunobiology, Yale School of Medicine⟨50⟩]
NO MORE CIRCLES AND SQUARES IN POWERPOINT!
Akiko Iwasaki, PhD
Professor, Dept. of Immunobiology, Yale School of Medicine, HHMI
BioRender has revolutionized the way we draw and communicate our science. Because of the large number of pre-drawn icons and color schemes to choose from, I can create beautiful images that accurately depict our scientific findings in no time. I don't know what I would do without BioRender. My 'circles and square figure' days in PowerPoint are over!

generated_description:
**BioRender: Empowering Scientific Communication**

Founded in 2018 and based in Toronto, Canada, BioRender positions itself as the "Figma/Canva for scientists." As part of Y Combinator's Winter 2018 batch, BioRender has rapidly scaled to a team of 205 employees dedicated to transforming how scientists communicate complex concepts and data through beautiful visuals.

### **Mission: Democratizing Science Communication**

BioRender's core mission is straightforward yet ambitious: to accelerate the world's ability to learn, discover, and communicate science effectively. They aim to diminish the gap in science communication by providing tools that facilitate this process, making it accessible to scientists from various disciplines. 

### **What They Offer**

At its heart, BioRender offers web-based graphics communication tools that enable scientists to create professional scientific figures in minutes. With access to over 50,000 icons and templates across 30+ life science fields, users can effortlessly produce visually appealing materials without the need for complex design software. 

Their drag-and-drop interface simplifies the creation process, allowing scientists to generate figures up to 50 times faster than traditional methods, like clunky PowerPoint graphics. If users can't find the precise icon they need, BioRender offers a custom icon creation service available within 48 hours.

### **Who Uses BioRender?**

BioRender is already impacting the scientific community significantly, with over 2.5 million scientists utilizing their tools to create figures. The platform sees exports of around 30,000 figures monthly, gaining approximately 300,000 citations. Renowned institutions, including Johns Hopkins, the University of Cambridge, and the National Institutes of Health, leverage BioRender for their scientific communication needs, testament to its credibility and effectiveness.

### **Join the Revolution**

If you're part of the scientific community and tired of circular diagrams in PowerPoint, BioRender offers an inviting solution. Whether you're crafting presentations, publishing papers, or pitching grants, their tools can enhance how you illustrate your findings. 

Visit [biorender.com](https://www.biorender.com) to explore their features, pricing, and get started on your journey to clearer, more effective science communication.
